subject: Re: [junit] displaying multiple errors from the same condition
msgSnippet: ...  Gosh. I never knew that. And empty map and set, too. Thanks. Some code-hacking seems likely ... -- Chris another virtual machine Dollin
messageBody:
On Wednesday 30 November 2005 23:41, J. B. Rainsberger wrote:

> By the way, the "emptyList" constant already exists:
> Collections.EMPTY_LIST.

<fx:peek/> Gosh. I never knew that. And empty map and set, too.
Thanks. Some code-hacking seems likely ...

--
Chris "another virtual machine" Dollin
"Certainly the absence of a smiley is not a syntax error or a constraint
violation, and therefore doesn't require a diagnostic." (Richard Heathfield)
